statements: SELECT * FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage;
SELECT id, material_name, usage_date FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage;
SELECT material_name, usage_amount FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage WHERE material_name LIKE 'Plastic%';
SELECT id, material_name, usage_date FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage ORDER BY usage_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(usage_amount) AS total_usage FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage GROUP BY material_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT id, material_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM usage_date) AS usage_month FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage WHERE usage_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage WHERE material_name LIKE 'paper%' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM usage_date) = 2021;
SELECT MAX(usage_amount) AS max_usage, MIN(usage_amount) AS min_usage FROM biodegradable_packaging_usage;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT material_name, biodegradable FROM packaging_materials;
SELECT * FROM usage_tracking WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM packaging_materials JOIN usage_tracking ON packaging_materials.id = usage_tracking.material_id;
SELECT tracking_id, usage_date FROM usage_tracking ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM packaging_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT material_name, biodegradable FROM packaging_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM usage_tracking WHERE quantity_used > 100 ORDER BY usage_date ASC;
SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_usage FROM packaging_materials JOIN usage_tracking ON packaging_materials.id = usage_tracking.material_id GROUP BY material_name;
SELECT material_name, COUNT(*) AS usage_count FROM packaging_materials JOIN usage_tracking ON packaging_materials.id = usage_tracking.material_id GROUP BY material_name HAVING usage_count > 2;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_materials_usage;
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT * FROM material_composition WHERE compostable = TRUE;
SELECT producer_name, location FROM material_producers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_materials_usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE quantity_used > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT material_name, compostable FROM material_composition WHERE recyclable = TRUE
SELECT * FROM material_producers WHERE location = 'USA' ORDER BY producer_name
SELECT SUM(quantity_used) AS total_quantity FROM biodegradable_materials_usage
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Usage WHERE quantity_used > 100;
SELECT material_name, usage_date FROM Packaging_Usage WHERE material_name = 'Cardboard';
SELECT id, supplier_name, location FROM Packaging_Supplier ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Inventory WHERE quantity_available < 50;
SELECT action, action_date FROM Packaging_Log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Usage ORDER BY usage_date DESC, quantity_used ASC
SELECT material_name, quantity_used FROM Packaging_Inventory WHERE quantity_available > 100 ORDER BY material_name
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Packaging_Supplier WHERE location LIKE '%New York%'
SELECT id, action, action_date FROM Packaging_Log WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY action_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Packaging_Usage WHERE material_name = 'Cardboard' AND quantity_used > 50
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_materials_usage
SELECT material_name, usage_amount FROM biodegradable_materials_usage ORDER BY usage_amount DESC
SELECT usage_amount, usage_date FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE material_name = 'Paper'
SELECT * FROM material_categories LIMIT 5
SELECT packaging_name, packaging_type FROM product_packaging WHERE material_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE usage_amount > 100 ORDER BY usage_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, usage_amount FROM biodegradable_materials_usage WHERE material_name LIKE '%packaging%' AND usage_amount < 50 ORDER BY material_name ASC;

SELECT u.user_id, p.packaging_name, f.rating FROM user_feedback f JOIN product_packaging p ON f.packaging_id = p.packaging_id JOIN biodegradable_materials_usage u ON p.material_id = u.id WHERE f.rating >= 4 ORDER BY u.user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_inventory WHERE available_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY inventory_id DESC;

SELECT p.packaging_name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM product_packaging p LEFT JOIN user_feedback f ON p.packaging_id = f.packaging_id GROUP BY p.packaging_name HAVING total_feedback > 5 ORDER BY total_feedback DESC;
